analyzed: bca' ba/_dgos pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten phyi mar rang ni don klu la sogs pa'i gnod zhi ba zhi bar byed pa

analyzed: gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon can gyi bsgrub thabs zhes bya ba/

analyzed: brjod bya bdag gis tshhig dang yi ge'i tshhogs kyi brjod byed kyis bshad par bya/_/sems can thams cad

analyzed: kyi don du sems bskyed byas shing dbang bskur thob/_/'dir dbang bskur ba'i don byin

analyzed: rlabs kyi gdams pa 'chad bla ma mnyes byas rang nyid kyi chos gang gi sgor zhugs pa dang bla ma des ji skad gsungs

analyzed: byas la sems can sdug bsngal ba 'di rnams snying re rje bas 'a/'khor ba nas gdon snyam du bsgrub pa pos/

analyzed: lci bas byug_/de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su mchod rten tshhad ldan brtshig_/snying

analyzed: po gzungs sngags sku gzugs bris sku phyag mtshhan rdo rje rtshe lnga pa rnams/_/sngags pas mchod rten

analyzed: de'i nang du gzhug du gsol/_/de nas rang nyid bde ba'i stan la 'dug_/sems

analyzed: thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas la go 'phang de la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed sngon du

analyzed: song ba yis/_/lus dag pa ngag dag pa khrus bya yi ge brgya pa brjod/_/rang nyid kyi snying
